description:
A friend of Kashiwagi Asuka. They were close in high school and have somewhat drifted apart. She works at a famous pharmaceutical company and is staying at the resort for vacation. 
She`s a timid woman and is very scared regarding her health since she has problems with her memory and feels very tired.[spoiler=" Also the gruesome events that has transpired might have something to do with her job as well. "][/spoiler]
name: Seo Naomi
